text: The number of electrons that must be removed from an electrically neutral silver dollar to give it a charge of +2.4 C is
hint: Total charge, q = + 2.4C Then by quantization of charge, q = ne [F05C] Number of electrons,  <math display="block"> <mrow>n=<mfrac><mrow>q</mrow><mrow>e</mrow></mfrac>=<mfrac><mrow>2.4C</mrow><mrow>1.6×1<msup><mrow>0</mrow><mrow>-19</mrow></msup>C</mrow></mfrac>=1.5×1<msup><mrow>0</mrow><mrow>19</mrow></msup></mrow> </math>
